move(int, int, int, int) - Method in class kindred.model.Game
Moves Unit from the specified team on Tile (xi, yi) to Tile (xf, yf) on this Map during the current player's turn.

move(int[]) - Method in class kindred.network.Client
Sends a game MOVE command to the Server.
movement - Variable in class kindred.model.Attribute
Indicates the maximum number of Tiles a Unit can move during each turn.
movePenalty - Variable in class kindred.model.Terrain
Movement penalty inflicted on a Unit standing on a Tile with this terrain.
